title: The Case For Paying NCAA Athletes
description:
A trial is underway in a California courtroom that might lead to athletes being allowed the right to share in the profits they help generate on and off the field. But does the NCAA hold the upper hand in the case? David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg News Business of Sports reporter Eben Novy-Williams.
FOLLOW UP
Eben's latest: Athletes Put NCAA Back in Hot Seat in Push to Undo Pay Limits
You can follow Eben at @novy_williams
